body_html:
Sorry you're running into this. Some questions:

  • Could you include the output of your run of the configure script?
  • Does the build work with a simpler setup (CPU-only, no-CUDA, reduced custom flags etc.)?

Does the build work with a simpler setup (CPU-only, no-CUDA, reduced custom flags etc.)?
body:
Sorry you're running into this. Some questions:

- Could you include the output of your run of the `configure` script?
- Does the build work with a simpler setup (CPU-only, no-CUDA, reduced custom flags etc.)?
